vote.title: Authorize a one-year cooperative purchasing agreement for a microwave radio system upgrade for the Water Utilities Department with Johnston Technical Services, Inc. dba JTS through the Texas Department of Information Resources cooperative agreement - Not to exceed $461,504.98 - Financing: Water Construction Fund ($330,112.00) and Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($131,392.98)
